org.freezedry.persistence

Class AbstractFileBasedPersistence

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freezedry.persistence.AbstractPersistence
      • org.freezedry.persistence.AbstractFileBasedPersistence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistence
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonPersistence, KeyValuePersistence, XmlPersistence

    public abstract class AbstractFileBasedPersistence
extends AbstractPersistence
    Abstract class that provides methods to read the persisted form of the object from a file with the specified name, and write an object in its persisted form to a file with a specified name.

    This class converts the file names into a PrintWriter and InputStreamReader an forwards the calls to the AbstractPersistence.write(Object, java.io.Writer) and AbstractPersistence.read(Class, Reader) methods implemented by the subclasses, respectively.

      AbstractFileBasedPersistence()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T read(java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz, java.lang.String fileName)
      Reads an object from the persisted form in the file with the specified name, using the specifed class as the template for the object
      void write(java.lang.Object object, java.lang.String fileName)
      Writes the specified object into the file using the persistence mechanism implemented in the concrete subclasses.

        public void write(java.lang.Object object,
         java.lang.String fileName)
        Writes the specified object into the file using the persistence mechanism implemented in the concrete subclasses.

        fileName - The name of the file into which to persist the object

      • read

        public <T> T read(java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz,
         java.lang.String fileName)
        Reads an object from the persisted form in the file with the specified name, using the specifed class as the template for the object
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class from which to create the object from its persisted form
        fileName - The name of the file holding the persisted object
        Returns:
        The reconstituted object read from the file
